description: Juicy peach, salty prosciutto, fresh basil and creamy bocconcini come together for a flavour explosion. You can't go wrong with this quick and easy canape.
keywords: Finger food,Canapés,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Stone fruit,Dec 2021,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Cold canapés,Peanut free
name: Peach, Prosciutto, Bocconcini & Basil Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 yellow peaches, halved, destoned, each half cut into 3 thick wedges
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Halve prosciutto crossways, then cut each piece lengthways. Wrap 1 piece of prosciutto around 1 wedge of peach.
Top each wedge of peach with a bocconcini ball and basil leaf. Secure stack with a cocktail skewer.
Place oil, vinegar and sugar in a small bowl. Whisk lightly to combine. Season with pepper. Drizzle over bites just before serving.
